First mate – Your starting deck contains “[i]Despair’s Emissary[/i]” and at least eight cards that could target a player. [i](If this card outside the game is your chosen first mate, you may swap it with a card in your opening hand.)[/i]
Whenever you cast a spell that targets an opponent, target creature you control gets +2/+0 and gains menace until end of turn.
